attributes.review:
first of all i js wanna say that when i downloaded the app there were a bunch of oranges outside my house 🍊 the oranges started appearing in my house. when i went to my room i saw the BIG MIGHTY FAT NAKED CHEETO STANDING IN THE MIDDLE OF MY ROOM! IT WAS SURROUNDED BY ORANGES! I also HATED the fact that i had to DOWNLOAD THIS STUPID APP to give a rating :) LETS HOPE U NOT BE IN THE OFFICE AGAIN you ORANGE 
CHEETOOOOOO!!!!!!! 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: DISGUSTING CHEETO 🤢🤮

attributes.userName: Only in it for the points
attributes.review: For the people who genuinely like the app, is like you to download the Bernie Sanders app. It unfortunately that the man behind this one is probably one the most hate “American” in the US. Good luck and I hope we can take this app down!!!
attributes.title: ✨Please Stop Trying✨

attributes.review: There’s this weird glitch that doesn’t allow me to open the app without seeing a clown? I don’t know why y’all think this is funny, I thought this was supposed to be a serious presidential app???
attributes.title: Weird glitch

attributes.review: Attempted to open the app and felt the worse pain of my life, I thought maybe it was just me so then I once again tried to open it, this time my neighbors cat died. Serious hazard, it should be removed.
attributes.title: Horreeebal

attributes.review: This terrible app is a scam to spy on Americans and gather our personal information. It sent me messages trying to silence me and restrict my first amendment right but here I am. I very much would not recommend this app if you value your safety.
attributes.title: This app is watching me...

attributes.review: The app is quiet terrible overall. It’s very glitchy and doesn’t work half the time. I would’ve expected something a bit better for the president of the United States.
attributes.title: Overall terrible app

attributes.review: This is one the worst apps i’ve ever had the dishonor of having on my phone. It constantly made my phone glitch and there a very scary orange man trying to push racism and xenophobia in america. I’m very afraid for the well being of this country.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Very bad app! Made my whole phone turn off! Thanks a lot now I have to buy a new phone because mine keeps glitching! Also it killed my dog and now is forcing me to deliver babies!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡and IM NOT EVEN A DOCTOR😡🤬bad app
attributes.title: Delete this app! Can’t even see anymore!

attributes.review: I was scared for my life the Cheeto was just staring at me and I got scared this not okay I want this app banned this doesn’t deserve to be 5 star I jumped when I saw that orange I don’t want other people to have a heart attack every time they open the app✨✌️
attributes.title: Just no

attributes.review: this pathetic app is the WORST. nothing works let alone opens on its own. i can’t even do simple things with this. my dog could have made a better app than this. how dare this app even call itself an app.
attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever used
